eg.document

Class UndoEdit

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.document.UndoEdit

  • public class UndoEdit
extends java.lang.Object
    An undo/redo editing for the document in EditArea.

    Undoing/redoing stops and breakpoints. These are included when the text change is newline, when the direction, i.e. insertion and removal, changes and when the change is longer than one character. Additional causes for breakpoints are added through markBreak() (used to mark breaks when the cursor was moved with the mouse or cursor keys). Already undone (and not redone) edits are removed when a new edit is added.

    Is created in TypingEdit

      Marks that the edit before the next edit that will be added is a breakpoint
      void redo()
      Redoes edits up to the next breakpoint that is located behind the redoable edits
      void undo()
      Undoes edits up to the next breakpoint that is located before the undoable edits
